readable.title: 3500505549_d848209837
readable.content: A person is rollerblading on a railing by a sidewalk with people . A person with glasses is performing an aerial trick on a post in the city . A skateboarder on a city street . Rollerblader in red shirt is skating on a handrail . The skateboarder does a trick on the railing while other people passing by watch .
